J, ma ọ bụ j, bụ mkpụrụedemede nke iri na mkpụrụedemede Bekee ọgbara ọhụrụ yana mkpụrụedemede Latịn nke ISO

Aha ya na bekee bụ jay (akpọ /ˈdʒeɪ/), nwere ụdị jy / ˈdʒaɪ/ na-adịkarị ugbu a.  Mgbe ejiri ya na mkpụrụedemede ụda olu mba ụwa maka ụda y, enwere ike ịkpọ ya yod ma ọ bụ jod (akpọ /ˈjɒd/ ma ọ bụ /ˈjoʊd/).
